Articles.Content:
This happened when I went into the VAB.

I opened the Debug menu and it showed "No Texture Memory Available to upload" and the game froze.

What does it mean? Not enough RAM?

I'm running 0.24.2 on OS X 10.9.4 with 4GB RAM.

Thanks!
Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky. "Texture Memory" refers to video RAM, so specs for your video card would help, too.
